title: Relates to plea bargains in felony sex offense cases; provides that certain pleas shall result in certain minimum punishments
summary: Provides that where a defendant is charged with a felony sex offense, then any plea of guilty must be or must include at least a plea of guilty to a sex felony.

       AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to plea bargains

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
